categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Gal Milnor was fought both on and above Gal Milnor in 3 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War. The destruction of a convoy of freighters and an Alliance storage facility greatly dampened the Alliance Fleet's effectiveness in the Outer Rim Territories for a considerable amount of time, until Admiral Yamarus made a pact with the smuggler coalition headed by Dunari.
